name: Seinfeld Dating Simulator
description:
You must successfully date all four main notoriously picky Seinfeld characters, each one on a separate game level: Kramer, Elaine Benes, George Costanza, and Jerry Seinfeld. You will need to convince the character you’re with that you’re a total catch in order to complete the level. To win the game you must defeat the final character, Jerry Seinfeld, the dating-boss.

Note: Seinfeld Dating Simulator is still in the prototype phase and currently only the Jerry Seinfeld level is available to play.
